nodes.text: The Ripoblus were the ruling body of the planet Ripoblus. Ripoblus forces fought against the Dimok in the Sepan Civil War until Imperial forces ended the conflict.

The Ripoblus possessed a sizeable fleet, consisting of BTL Y-wing starfighters, Z-95 Headhunters, Escort shuttles, and Lambda-class T-4a shuttles. For capitol ships, they used Nebulon-B Escort Frigates. During the war, the Secret Order of the Emperor suspected that they were armed by an Imperial, as an Order member noted that their facilities were not capable of producing craft they were using.
